Allen Solly Sneakers Price: Rs.2399

Crafted to please the eyes with its vibrant colouring of red
column13:
this pair of casual sneakers from Allen Solly comes with a beautifully designed exterior that is fashioned in such a way that it could make seemingly normal clothes more vivid. Team it with cargo pants and a red polo neck t-shirt along with a black leather jacket.

\r\n

\r\n\tUnderstanding the various needs for style in comfort
column14:
Allen Solly constantly refocuses its attention on miniscule details that has helped it carve a niche as one of the go-to brands for the choicest footwear.

Footwear Care

Air the shoes out after every use. Wipe clean with a soft cloth.
